Although I thought this dress was so pretty and a great fit, the quality is not at all worth $50. Maybe I’m missing something? I don’t know much about Rayon but it just felt cheap. Also wrinkles easily. I kept it because I was ordering last minute for a trip! Def a cute dress though.  I ordered a small. 5’3, 125lbs.

Loved this beautiful dress. The only thing is you need to iron this dress because it was pretty wrinkled and creased when it came in. Otherwise loved the color and the pattern of the dress. Pretty comfortable, flowey and soft material.

This dress is bad for the price. I should have listened to the reviews calling it frumpy 😅. With a corset maybe it'd be an acceptable costume piece, but to charge more than $15 for this is criminal and it's listed for around $50. I tried an underbust with it and still couldn't keep it knowing how much I paid. The seams don't line up right, and one looks to be coming undone, about to make a hole in the side. It's the kind of material that will always be wrinkled but at least it has a lining and the color is pretty accurate. Can't lift your arms at all, whatsoever, or the whole dress comes up. Pass on this one or find a cheaper listing imo. It's not the worst thing ever, but certainly not flattering or comfortable to move in. I got a large for my height, and it still sits a little high for me at 5'9. Rvimios has one with better reviews and it's cheaper, so if I try this style again I'd look there first. Only bought from this listing for the color. (no pockets BTW)
Arrived with broken elastic. The top wouldn’t stay up around my shoulders. The style is cute but I’m afraid to reorder and have the same issue after a wear or two.

Decent, flowy, rayon fabric with good construction. Plenty of ease so it fits nicely. Nice surprise, the black one is fully lined. I also purchased the leopard print aqua blue one that is puzzlingly not lined. It also fits well but not quite as nicely as the lined, black one. Not really see-thru anyway. The style is flattering and the off the shoulder effect is pretty and doesn't fall down. I bought large just to be sure it was flowy. Medium probably would have been fine. I'm tall and it hits about mid-calf.
I didn’t really like this dress because of the quality of material. The style was very cute but the material was flimsy and thin so I sent it back.

The ZESICA Women's Sexy Boho Off Shoulder Dress is an absolute stunner! I wore it to a summer wedding, and I received so many compliments on it. Here’s what I loved about it:  Pros:  Stylish and Flattering: The off-shoulder design and puffed sleeves give it a romantic, boho-chic vibe that’s perfect for warm weather. The high waist and A-line cut are super flattering, creating a beautiful silhouette that made me feel confident and feminine. Comfortable Fit: The dress is made from a lightweight, flowy fabric that drapes beautifully without clinging to the body. It was comfortable to wear all day, even in the heat. The elastic around the shoulders and waist is snug but not too tight, so it stays in place without needing constant adjustment. Versatile: This dress is incredibly versatile. I dressed it up with heels and jewelry for the wedding, but I can easily see myself wearing it with sandals for a casual day out. The ruffled hem adds a playful touch that works for both formal and informal occasions. True to Size: I ordered my usual size, and it fit perfectly. The size chart provided was accurate, which was a relief since ordering clothes online can sometimes be tricky. Cons:  Sheerness: The lighter colors are slightly sheer, so I recommend wearing nude undergarments or a slip underneath to avoid any see-through mishaps. This wasn’t a deal-breaker for me, but something to be aware of. Wrinkles Easily: The fabric tends to wrinkle a bit, so you might need to give it a quick steam or iron before wearing it. Again, a minor issue considering how gorgeous the dress is. Overall Impression: The ZESICA Women's Off Shoulder Puff Sleeve Dress is a must-have for anyone who loves boho-inspired fashion. It’s flattering, comfortable, and versatile, making it a great addition to your wardrobe for 2024. Whether you’re attending a wedding, going on a date, or just enjoying a summer day, this dress will make you feel like the star of the show. Highly recommend!
This dress is great! It fits true to size and is so comfy. Very durable fabric and very flattering

This dress is very cute. Fits well, is super comfy and will be perfect to wear for an outdoor summer wedding. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it didn’t come lined. The description states that “all colors are lined.” Mine does not have a lining. I will keep it because it’s cute and fits well and hopefully the green pattern color will not show through. Second picture shows the dress inside out, with NO lining.
Wife was happy

I love to wear soft, flowy, beautiful dresses. I'm breastfeeding exclusively and wear my baby in a wrap constantly. This dress is perfect for my wants and lifestyle! The neckline is a nice square when the sleeves are up or straight when you wear it as an off the shoulder dress. The elastic neckline pulls out of the way easily to feed a hungry baby! The material is so soft and comfortable. I love to wear it and it's so effortless to look nice without being uncomfortable. It is nice and lightweight so it's not super hot, but isn't see through thanks to the built in slip. I would say it fits true to size. I'm 5'7" and 165 lbs (still holding onto that baby weight) and am currently a 38 DD. I bought a large and it fits like a glove. It's flattering so my slowly returning waistline and my husband thinks it's stunning on me. I love the white and plan on getting it in other colors! It washed up nice in warm water and I threw it in the dryer (who has time to hang dry stuff with a baby?) And it dried nicely. I hung it up and it didn't hold any wrinkles. 10/10 would recommend to a friend!
I’m not sure if it was the packaging or manufacturing but I bought this for a trip and wore it right away without washing. It broke out my sensitive skin so badly.
The colors are beautiful in person just not the right fit
Love the dresses. Got them in two different colors!

This dress is so cute, flattering, and NOT see-through. I ordered the light blue color and it is lovely. I am 5'2 and between a 12 and a 14 - this fits great and is very flattering on me. I will be ordering other colors.

I love the color and the fabric of this dress. However, it came with two large holes and one smaller hole. I can stitch them up, but this dress will not stay in my rotation as it can’t hold up with everyday wear and tear.
Cheap fabric. Pattern didn't look as elegant in person. Fit was expected.

Bought this for family pictures as an option, and I was pleasantly surprised. Material is lightweight and breathable. Can be worn off or on the shoulders. When wearing the sleeves off the shoulder, they don’t pop back onto the shoulders. It’s a beautiful dress!

评论详情: I absolutely love this dress. For reference I’m 5’7 and weigh 155 pounds and I’m curvy. This dress accentuates my smaller waist and the off the shoulder doesn’t ride up like many other dresses I’ve worn in the past. It’s lightweight and will be a staple this summer. Sooo soft and comfortable. Cooling feeling. Fits great I am on the edge of size large and X-Large in most things and I got an xl and I could probably have went with large. Material is super soft and slick cooling feeling. Not see through though. Good length. I’m big chested and have a belly pouch 180 pounds and it’s flattering.

Stunning dress.  Very comfortable.  SUPER nursing friendly and can be bump friendly too .  It is not see through which was surprising because I had the pale yellow color.  Can be worn off or on the shoulders.

This is a lovely dress, but has some cons.  It says You can wear on or off the shoulder, but if you wear it on the shoulder it pulls up so that the first seam that's supposed to be under the bust rides up across the chest. So I was constantly pulling it back down. So I'd say this is a true off the shoulder dress. Make sure you have a good strapless bra.  It wrinkles easily, but came out nicely when I popped it in the dryer on low with some wet clothes.  The price seems a little high for what it is but alas, *inflation*.  Otherwise I thought it was beautiful and I felt like a cottagecore princess on mothers day ❤️

This worked out well, I got lots of compliments! It not sheer at all, I only had one small complaint. The inner liner bunches up under the elastic waist but I am a B cup so it might not bunch up for someone with a larger bust.

评论概述: Review for the company itself, not the dress
评论详情: First off, I love the dress. Beautiful color and very comfortable. Does need to be washed to get rid of the wrinkles first.  I am not happy with the actions of the company I bought this dress from. I made my purchase last Saturday and clicked 1 day shipping, as I purchased the dress for a wedding today. The dress was also listed as prime eligible. The dress shipped from California yesterday, 6 days after I purchased, and expected to be delivered by 10pm tonight in New Jersey. Thankfully it arrived with plenty of time before the wedding.  The dress was shipped in a clear ziplock bag with holes in it, allowing for dirt and liquids to get inside and stain the dress (thankfully this did not happen) and the ability for someone to just take the dress out of the packaging during shipping.
